## Introduction 

Convert the Daily data of a stock to Weekly data. The dataframe should contain six columns named `SYMBOL`, `OPEN`, `HIGH`, `LOW`, `CLOSE`, `DATE`. 


```
# Example
library(nser)
data(dailydata)
daytoweek(dailydata)
```
